sentences.english: Each one set of pilot ladder near port and starboard of the main deck shall be provided.
sentences.chinese: 主甲板的左右舷附近各安裝一個引水員軟梯。

sentences.english: I suspended a rope-ladder from the rail of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 我將一個軟梯懸掛在船欄杆上。

sentences.english: The settlers soon became habituated to the use of this ladder.
sentences.chinese: 居民們很快就習慣用軟梯上下了。

sentences.english: Storage position of pilot ladder on main deck.
sentences.chinese: 主甲板上應有堆放引水員軟梯的場所。

sentences.english: At this point, the helicopter down Ruanti to save the priest.
sentences.chinese: 此時，有架直升機放下軟梯來拯救神父。
